alert: Expect mostly sunny weather on December 18 and 19 with highs of 17.3°C and 19.5°C respectively, but a chance of light rain is expected from December 20 onwards with precipitation chances reaching up to 63% on December 21. A significant drop in temperature is expected on December 23 with a low of 7.6°C, and windy conditions with gusts up to 34.2 km/h. Generally dry and sunny weather is expected on December 24 with a high of 16.4°C and a low of 6.6°C.
